Reference

All functions

add_meta()

Add a metadata to be included in the shiny app

check_config()

Checks if shinycell config data.table contains any errors

create_config()

Create a shinycell config data.table

del_meta()

Remove a metadata from being included in the shiny app

make_app()

Make a shiny app

make_code()

Generate code files required for shiny app (one dataset)

make_code_multi()

Generate code files required for shiny app (multi datasets)

make_dockerfile()

Create Dockerfile

make_file()

Generate data files required for shiny app

make_meta_categorical()

Updates shinycell config to recognize a metadata as a discrete one

make_shiny_config()

Create config for shiny server

mod_colour()

Modify the colour palette for categorical metadata

mod_default()

Set the default metadata to display

mod_label()

Modify the legend labels for categorical metadata

mod_meta_name()

Modify the display name of metadata

reorder_meta()

Reorder the order in which metadata appear in the shiny app

show_legend()

Shows the legends for single-cell metadata

show_order()

Shows the order in which metadata will be displayed

wr_about()

Write code for about. about.md

wr_css()

Write code for custom css. www/styles.css

wr_font()

Write code for font

wr_lib()

Write code for loading libraries

wr_load()

Write code for loading data

wr_sv_about()

Does nothing

wr_sv_civci()

Write code for server civci

wr_sv_civge()

Write code for server civge

wr_sv_end()

Write code for server end

wr_sv_fix()

Write code for fixed portion of server.R

wr_sv_gec()

Write code for server gec

wr_sv_gem()

Write code for server gem

wr_sv_gevge()

Write code for server gevge

wr_sv_hea()

Write code for server civge

wr_sv_main()

Write code for server main block

wr_sv_mar()

Write code for server mar

wr_sv_pro()

Write code for server pro

wr_sv_vio()

Write code for server vio

wr_ui_about()

Write code for about page

wr_ui_civci()

Write code for ui civci

wr_ui_civge()

Write code for ui civge

wr_ui_end()

Write code for final portion of ui.R

wr_ui_ga()

Write code for google-analytics.html

wr_ui_gec()

Write code for ui gec

wr_ui_gem()

Write code for ui gem

wr_ui_gevge()

Write code for ui gevge

wr_ui_hea()

Write code for ui hea

wr_ui_main()

Write code for main block of ui.R

wr_ui_mar()

Write code for ui mar

wr_ui_pro()

Write code for ui pro

wr_ui_single()

Write code for ui beginning

wr_ui_vio()

Write code for ui vio
